name: Streaks HairSerum
description: The Streax Hair Serum features a non-greasy and lightweight formula that easily absorbs into your hair without leaving any residue.

name: Korean rice water clenser
description: This gentle Rice Water Bright cleansing Foam from The Face Shop is enriched with rice extracts and offers your skin a clear and even complexion.

name: Neutriderm moisturizer
description: Neutriderm Moisturising Lotion is soft, non-greasy, gentle on the skin, and has a pleasing fragrance.

name: Loreal-paris hair conditioner
description: A moisturising agent designed to give hair shine, smooth out strands and leave them feeling soft.

name: Face snail Serum
description: Snail Serum is known for its amazing regenerating properties which promotes cell turnover, reduces hyperpigmentation & blemishes, prevents breakouts and improves overall skin texture.
